title: What Can Klay Thompson and James Wiseman Offer the Warriors This Season? | Real Ones
description:
Fresh off Warriors media day and the first preseason game of the season, Logan and Raja discuss Klay Thompson’s mindset going into this season (0:40) and what James Wiseman’s role will be (18:15). Then they talk about the absolute mess that the Ben Simmons situation has become (32:05), Zion Williamson’s position in New Orleans (45:05), and the money Kyrie Irving stands to lose by not getting vaccinated (52:00) before each awarding their Real One of the Week (53:30).
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
